subject: the meeting i normally have at 8am on tuesdays is moving to 9am next week
body:
it was my one year anniversary at work yesterday and my coworkers wrote very sweet messages to/about me.

the meeting i normally have at 8am on tuesdays is moving to 9am next week, which means that then¬†i'll only have a single regular meeting before 9 every two weeks and i'll generally be able to work out first thing in the morning, which will help with my exercise consistency

generally i have way fewer meetings this week than last week. yesterday i had a meeting about engineering growth opportunities for me that was exciting.

[runjs](https://runjs.app/), which is a really nice little desktop sandbox i used yesterday to explore how [this module](https://www.npmjs.com/package/p-queue) will help with a project where i'm dealing with API limits and will also be useful for experimenting with typescript

filled my day of the week pill container on monday, always a good omen for the week

started taking [a probiotic](https://www.gardenoflife.com/dr-formulated-probiotics-mood-daily-care) after not taking one for a while

sauteed a leftover bowl of brussels sprouts leaves in olive oil and added them to some leftover rice (used to pad out our thai takeout over the weekend) with furikake and nam pla for lunch. that it is satisfying when you find ways not to waste food.

d made cinnamon rolls with cream cheese icing and though she was concerned because we didn't have whole milk, they came out really well.

finished watching _bling empire_, which ended up being both insane and poignant in ways that i had not predicted; group chats about _bling empire_

this is a pretty boring entry, but whenever these notes are boring (and yet i do them anyway), that's generally a good sign about how my life is going, even if it means they are less interesting to read ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

that flaubert quote about how you should "be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work"

the youtube algo dropped me on [this channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/Shook575/featured)'s ["random" compilation videos](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q8ZXeBM6eSM) and that is one of my favorite
